announcements.title: ABBA v0.11.0 Released
announcements.content:
Welcome to ABBA 0.11.0!

New features and improvements

Standard Export: Share your projects as standardized .zip files with resampled data and metadata.

QuickNII Integration: Import and export QuickNII projects.

Methods Generator: Use an automatically generated prompt to get publication-ready methods with DOIs and registration details.

Brightfield images: Added support for white background, eliminating black edge artifacts during registration.

Plus: New light/dark themes, improved UI with icons, drag-and-drop support, and much more!
